item.title: 印尼大刀阔斧的改革为何令市场恐慌？
item.description: 自总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）10 月份上任以来，印尼股市一路下滑，到 3 月底，印尼盾跌至 1997-1998 年亚洲金融危机以来的最低水平，当时印尼得到了国际货币基金组织的救助。【原文：Since President Prabowo Subianto took office in October, Indonesia’s stock market has slumped and by late March the rupiah had tumbled to its lowest level since the 1997-1998 Asian financial crisis, when the country was bailed out by the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 越南建议削减液化天然气、汽车和农产品关税
item.description: 越南财政部提出了一项削减包括液化天然气、汽车、木材和农产品在内的一系列产品优惠进口关税的建议，以避免美国关税迫在眉睫的威胁。【原文：Vietnam’s finance ministry has put forward a proposal to cut preferential import tariffs on a range of products including LNG, cars, wood, and agricultural products, as the nation seeks to avoid the imminent threat of US tariffs.】

item.title: 泰国总理在他信被审查后首次通过不信任投票
item.description: 泰国总理白通丹-西那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）在议会的不信任投票中幸免于难，在为期两天的辩论中，反对派将矛头指向了她，指责她的父亲对政府的影响以及政府对经济的管理不善。【原文：Thai Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra survived a no-confidence vote in parliament after a two-day debate where the opposition targeted her over her father’s alleged influence on the government and its mismanagement of the economy.】

item.title: Mandiri 股息超出预期后印尼股市上涨
item.description: 在几家国有银行提高派息后，印尼基准股票指数上扬。【原文：Indonesia’s benchmark equity index advanced after several state-owned banks offered higher dividend payouts.】

item.title: 印度银行十多年来首笔美元贷款吸引了 22 家银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度银行已通过美元银团贷款筹集到 4 亿美元资金，这是该银行自 2012 年以来首次进行此类交易，扩大了印度在全球信贷市场上的借款人名单。【原文：Bank of India has raised $400 million via a dollar syndicated loan, according to people familiar with the matter, marking its first such deal since 2012 that expands a list of the country’s borrowers tapping global credit markets.】

item.title: 印度市场回暖，主题共同基金热潮减退
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 牧野铣削公司工会表示反对日本电产收购牧野铣削公司
item.description: 牧野铣床公司的官方工会重申，反对日本电产公司斥资 16 亿美元收购这家机床制造商，认为任何交易的商业意义都不明确。【原文：Makino Milling Machine Co.’s official labor union reiterated its opposition to Nidec Corp.’s $1.6 billion offer to acquire the machine tool maker, arguing that the business sense of any deal was unclear.】

item.title: 小企业渴望贷款，泰国小额贷款公司寻求扩张
item.description: Abacus Digital 是一家由泰国最大的金融集团支持的金融科技公司，它计划在传统贷款机构对不良贷款增加更加警惕的情况下，加大对缺乏资金的个人和小企业的贷款力度。【原文：Abacus Digital, a fintech firm backed by Thailand’s largest financial group, plans to ramp up lending to individuals and small businesses starved of capital as traditional lenders turn more wary of rising bad loans.】

item.title: 卡尼招募前高盛银行家霍奇森参政
item.description: 马克-卡尼招募了曾在加拿大银行担任其顾问的前高盛银行家蒂莫西-霍奇森（Timothy Hodgson）为自由党参选。【原文：Mark Carney recruited Timothy Hodgson, a former Goldman Sachs banker who was an adviser to him at the Bank of Canada, to run for the Liberal Party in the country’s election.】

item.title: 马来西亚机场称吉隆坡国际机场发现网络安全威胁
item.description: 马来西亚国家网络安全局和马来西亚机场在一份联合声明中说，吉隆坡国际机场的计算机系统在周日发现了网络安全威胁。【原文：A cyber security threat affecting computer systems at the Kuala Lumpur International Airport was detected on Sunday, the National Cyber Security Agency and Malaysia Airports said in a joint statement.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡连续第二次会议维持政策利率不变
item.description: 斯里兰卡中央银行在连续第二次会议上保持基准利率稳定，以引导通货膨胀率向目标迈进，同时促进经济复苏。【原文：Sri Lanka’s central bank kept its benchmark interest rate steady for the second straight meeting to steer inflation toward the target while bolstering an economic recovery.】

item.title: 德拉吉称德国国防开支的转变 "改变了游戏规则
item.description: 欧洲中央银行前行长马里奥-德拉吉（Mario Draghi）说，德国增加国防开支的决定 "改变了游戏规则"，但他警告说，如何实施这一决定存在风险。【原文：Former European Central Bank President Mario Draghi said Germany’s decision to ramp up defense spending is a “game changer” but warned there are risks when it comes to how its implemented.】

item.title: 据称长江和记将不顾中国反对继续推进港口交易
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，长江和记控股有限公司向贝莱德集团（BlackRock Inc.【原文：CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.’s plan to sell two Panama ports to a BlackRock Inc.-led group is moving ahead as scheduled, people familiar with the matter said, in a sign that negotiations have not yet been disrupted by China’s anger over the transaction.】

item.title: 中国重获青睐，最热门新兴 ETF 资金流出创纪录
item.description: 新兴市场最受欢迎的 ETF 之一在经历了长达两年的辉煌表现后迅速失宠，原因是投资者在全球增长忧虑和一触即发的贸易紧张局势中对前景进行了重新评估。【原文：One of the most popular ETFs in emerging markets is quickly falling out of favor after a stellar two-year run as investors reassess the outlook amid global growth concerns and simmering trade tensions.】

item.title: 印度的苛捐杂税是卡森-布洛克等人的心头大患
item.description: 在全球股市大涨之际，重返印度股市的全球基金不得不搁置像浑水资本公司（Muddy Waters Capital LLC）创始人卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）这样的投资者所表达的最大不满之一，即印度的高税收。【原文：Global funds returning to India’s stock market amid a world-beating rally are having to set aside one of the biggest gripes expressed by investors like Muddy Waters Capital LLC founder Carson Block — namely the country’s high taxes.】

item.title: 上田表示，如果前景可期，日本央行将继续上调基准利率
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫表示，如果经济预期得以实现，日本央行将继续上调基准利率。【原文：The Bank of Japan will continue to raise its benchmark interest rate if economic projections are realized, Governor Kazuo Ueda said.】

item.title: 任天堂股价大涨，因为高盛认为 Switch 2 为用户提供了动力
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co.）股价创下七个多月来最大涨幅，此前高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Nintendo Co. shares gained the most in over seven months after Goldman Sachs Group Inc. said it expects the upcoming release of its Switch 2 console to drive active users to new highs.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利以盈利为由再次上调中国股票目标价
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的策略师们在一个多月内第二次上调了对中国股市的展望，认为在盈利前景改善的情况下，估值仍有上升空间。【原文：Morgan Stanley strategists raised their outlook for Chinese stocks for second time in a little more than a month, citing upside for valuations amid an improving outlook for earnings.】

item.title: 李兆基的儿子们控制了价值 100 亿美元的恒基兆业股权
item.description: 根据新的文件显示，已故香港亿万富翁李兆基的两个儿子现在控制着他们父亲持有的恒基兆业地产有限公司（Henderson Land Development Co.【原文：The two sons of the late Hong Kong billionaire Lee Shau-Kee now control their father’s $10 billion stake in property firm Henderson Land Development Co., according to new filings.】

item.title: 莫迪依靠家庭控制 3460 亿美元的债务堆积
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）面临着 3,460 亿美元的债务问题，他的政府希望得到全国家庭的帮助。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi has a $346 billion debt problem that his administration wants help for from the nation’s households.】

item.title: 特朗普可能在数周内实施铜进口关税
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国可能会在几周内对进口铜征收关税，这比做出决定的最后期限提前了几个月。【原文：US tariffs on copper imports could be coming within several weeks, months earlier than the deadline for a decision, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Amundi 看好韩国股市，看空者将延续涨势
item.description: 对于准备在下周禁令解除后瞄准韩国股票的做空者，欧洲最大的资产管理公司给出了一些建议：此举可能会适得其反。【原文：For short sellers who are ready to take aim at South Korean stocks when a ban is lifted next week, Europe’s biggest asset manager has some advice: such a move may backfire.】

item.title: 分析师称印尼盾将因财政困境创历史新低
item.description: 分析人士认为，随着东南亚最大经济体的政治和经济忧虑不断加剧，印尼盾将在短期内跌至历史新低。【原文：Analysts see Indonesia’s rupiah declining to a record low in the short term as political and economic worries continue to grow in Southeast Asia’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚月度通胀率下降，为降息提供了更多理由
item.description: 衡量澳大利亚通货膨胀的一项指标在 2 月份意外降温，这为储备银行在未来几个月进一步降低利率提供了依据。【原文：A measure of Australian inflation unexpectedly cooled in February, bolstering the case for the Reserve Bank to reduce interest rates further in the months ahead.】

item.title: Couche-Tard 对美国的 Seven &amp 专卖店兴趣浓厚；我已达成协议
item.description: 加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司的首席财务官表示，如果 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司成功收购 Seven & i 控股公司（Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Private equity firms are showing strong interest in buying about 2,000 North American convenience stores that could be divested if Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. succeeds in its ¥7.39 trillion ($49 billion) endeavor to buy out Seven & i Holdings Co., the chief financial officer of the Canadian company said.】

item.title: 中国对液化天然气的需求减弱，年进口量将出现罕见下降
item.description: 中国正在迅速减少海运天然气的进口量，这对增长预测构成了威胁，而增长预测推动了全球数十亿美元的项目支出。【原文：China is rapidly cutting back on its seaborne gas imports, threatening growth forecasts that have driven multibillion-dollar spending on projects across the globe.】

item.title: 群聊风波中的特朗普内阁官员面临诉讼
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统内阁的五名成员在一桩诉讼中被指控使用加密信息平台 Signal 进行公务交流，违反了美国旨在保护政府记录的法律。【原文：Five members of President Donald Trump’s cabinet were accused in a lawsuit of violating US laws meant to safeguard government records by using the encrypted messaging platform Signal to communicate about official business.】

item.title: 帕拉丁能源公司因极端天气影响生产而暴跌
item.description: 帕拉丁能源有限公司（Paladin Energy Ltd.）股价暴跌，原因是这家澳大利亚铀矿开采商撤回了 2025 财年的生产指标，而此前纳米比亚矿山因极端降雨导致生产中断。【原文：Paladin Energy Ltd. shares tumbled after the Australian uranium miner withdrew production guidance for the 2025 fiscal year following disruptions at its Namibia mine caused by extreme rainfall.】

item.title: 英国石油和天然气许可证遭环保组织起诉
item.description: 一个自然保护组织正在伦敦法院就 31 个北海石油和天然气勘探许可证向英国政府提出质疑，该组织称这些许可证可能会危及海洋保护区和气候稳定。【原文：A conservation group is challenging Britain’s government in a London court over 31 North Sea oil and gas exploration licenses that it says could put marine protected areas and climate stability at risk.】

item.title: 研究发现，LGBTQ 歧视使东非国家每年损失 50 亿美元
item.description: 一项新的研究发现，对男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者的歧视日益加剧，每年给东非经济造成的损失高达 50 亿美元，如果肯尼亚通过一项法案，对同性性关系处以 10 年监禁，这一数字还将激增。【原文：Rising discrimination against LGBTQ people is costing East African economies as much as $5 billion a year, a figure that’s set to spike if Kenya passes a bill punishing same-sex relations with 10 years in jail, a new study found.】
